p: Another meta-analysis including 3,117 patients of 38 RCTs in China showed an overall response rate in treating lung cancer treated with lentinanIV (1–1.5 mg/d, 2–8 weeks, depending on the study), a main ingredient of Lentinula edodes, was increased from 43.3% of chemotherapy alone to 56.9% of lentinan plus chemotherapy. Compared with chemotherapy alone, lentinan plus chemotherapy showed more efficacy in treating lung cancer (pooled RR 0.79, 95% CI: 0.74–0.85) ( Zhang et al., 2018).
